subject: Re: Babs
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Babs,

Are you out of the Atlanta area?  If so are you from PSI?  My cousin 
Jim is in PSI, and purchased a 469 for the group.  He had heard some 
of my initial recordings of experiments I ran for audio set-up.  They 
were recorded with the 469, and did not come through until the 5th 
test for me.  It was as if the mish mash began being manipulated and 
I could then hear responses.  The recordings are under LC's... in the 
file section.  I currently have two 470's which will be experimented 
with after the holidays...

The more you work with the box, the more those on the other side 
become aware of one's attempts at making contact, IMHO.  For me, I 
can feel a spiritual presence when the audio bits/white noise begin 
being manipulated.  When in doubt, just keep making 
recordings...sooner or later you will begin hearing words, responses, 
sentences.  Some of what I heard has been quite crafty, such as 
giving me my wife's name clearly, right before she phoned me, etc.

LC


 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "babiarz3" <babiarz3@...> wrote:
>
> Thanks Juli, it's nice to be back. Holiday times always get so 
hectic.
> 
> On a side note here- I've been working with a 469 shack hack and 
have
> yet to get anything I can consider a direct response or intelligible
> communication. IMO, thus far, I hear nothing besides radio 
fragments.
> Going on the theory that this device enables the same real time 2-
way
> communication as Frank's Box or it's "children", requesting that my
> own name be said doesn't seem like it should be a difficult task. I
> have even told them my name, as a just-in-case measure. Nothing even
> resembling my name, or in name for that matter. When asked what 
their
> name is, also nothing but radio fragment. Sessions with EVPmaker 
have
> always provided intelligent responses and results.  
> 
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, juli velazquez <ghostchasingfool@>
> wrote:
> >
> > Nice to see your back in the swing of things!!!
> > 
> > babiarz3 <babiarz3@> wrote:          Here are a few links to some
> of Chris' public sessions with the Box.
> > These files are easy enough to find. I was going to put more 
but...
> > 
> > http://www.hauntedtimes.com/c2c.html (includes Edison EVP)
> > http://www.hauntedtimes.com/cpg132/thumbnails.php?album=24 (go 
thru
> > the pages here, many are from the TTTD)
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Robin-- I have watched this clip and it is the least convincing 
of 
> > > all the ones I have seen of him with the box. I have heard 
several 
> > > where some of the audio is clear enough to stand on its own 
without 
> > > his interpretation, and where his interpretation generally 
agrees. I 
> > > have also heard some where the audio I hear disagrees with his 
> > > interpretation, but not to such a high degree that I was 
overtly 
> > > troubled by it--it was in what I would call the high-end of my 
> > > tolerance range for subjectivity. I have heard audio where the 
> > > person asking questions of the box clearly heard answered that 
> > > appeared to move them greatly without dependance on Chris's 
> > > interpretation.
> > > 
> > > So, to try to sum up for you, my personal investigation led me 
to 
> > > believe that something was happening with the box. I did not 
always 
> > > agree with Chris's interpretation, but it appeared the same or 
close 
> > > to what I heard a high enough percentage of the time that I was 
> > > willing to accept he was not faking it, but giving it an honest 
> > > enough go. It led me to start hounding Frank for a box of my 
own, and 
> > > later to buy a minibox from Rick, since poor Frank was beset on 
all 
> > > sides. ;)
> > > 
> > > We've already had some spectacularly burning arguments about 
what 
> > > Chris claims his guides or technicians tell him behind closed 
doors. 
> > > As far as I know, no audio of this is public, so his claims 
can't be 
> > > evaluated. I think the proliferation of people getting results 
with 
> > > the boxes belies his assertion that only 30 are chosen.
> > > 
> > > Ann
> > > 
> > > 
> > > On Dec 30, 2007, at 11:09 PM, Robin Henson wrote:
> > > 
> > > > I think some of you were discussing this recently, but I'm 
wondering
> > > > what you all think. I've watched/listened to this video a 
number of
> > > > times and can't figure out if the participants are actually 
hearing
> > > > responses on their own or are totally relying on Chris to 
interpret 
> > > > for
> > > > them what is being said. I'm disappointed because I honestly 
can't
> > > > hear the words he's repeating as being from spirit.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T-wQZ7FU2Vc
> > > >
> > > > Robin
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > >
> >
